statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{14.05}; top has length \displaystyle{7.55}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.95} and \displaystyle{12.12}. The height is \displaystyle{10.89}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{7.55}+{12.12}+{14.05}+{10.95}={44.67}.
